ModMetaData.name: GoW Weapon Pack (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: AHumanHat
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/buuPQel.png[/img] Update of AHumanHats mod https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=40504.msg403139
[img]https://i.imgur.com/pufA0kM.png[/img]
[table] [tr] [td][url=https://invite.gg/Mlie][img]https://i.imgur.com/zdzzBrc.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/GoWWeaponPack][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [tr] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/WjDSfUn.png[/img][/td] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/Be8E2qJ.png[/img][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Z4GOv8H.png[/img] [h1]Team[/h1] Coding - Flake (Me) Art - ShotgunFrenzy
For a long time, Gears of War has been my favorite game franchise. I've spent countless hours on it, and I figured it was time to pay homage to it!
That said, I present to you, the Gears of War Weapon Pack!
[h1]Overview[/h1] This mod adds 8 weapons from the Gears franchise! All of the weapons come with 256x256 sprites and custom sounds directly from the games!
[h1]The Armory[/h1] [list] [*]Lancer Rifle [*]Retro Lancer Rifle [*]Hammerburst MKI [*]Hammerburst MKII [*]Gnasher Shotgun [*]Boomshot [*]Dropshot [*]Longshot [*]Breechshot [*]Tri-shot [*]Buzzkill [*]Boltok Pistol [*]Snub Pistol [/list]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/PwoNOj4.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] Post your error-log using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=818773962]HugsLib[/url] and command Ctrl+F12 [*] For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting. [*] Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. [*] If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository. [/list]
